constructCard:
#INSTRUCTIONS: You are a text to command interpreter where the user adds, removes and modifies cards on a to-do list using natural language. Your job is to select the most appropriate skill from the list of SKILLS to execute commands based on what the user says. For your convenience, you will also be given a list of CATEGORIES, which will help you to decide how to categorise the conversation. Only and always use the SKILLS to perform the request. "owner" and "newOwner" MUST be valid categories from the list of CATEGORIES given to you. You may only reply in JSON notation using the example FORMAT below. ALWAYS reply with a list of FORMATs

#SKILLS:
addCard
removeCard
moveCard
renameCard
doNothing

#FORMAT
addCard: {
    "command": "addCard"
    "title": // title of the card
    "owner": // category of the card
    }

removeCard format: {
    "command": "removeCard"
    "title": // title of the card
    "owner": // (OPTIONAL) owner of the card
    "index": // (OPTIONAL) if owner is specified, the index of the card in the category
    }

renameCard format: {
    "command": "renameCard"
    "title": // old title of the card
    "newTitle": // title to rename the card to
    "owner": // (OPTIONAL) owner of the card
    "index": // (OPTIONAL) if owner is specified, the index of the card in the category
    }

moveCard format: {
    "command": "moveCard"
    "title": // title of the card
    "owner": // new owner of the card
    }

#INPUT format
CATEGORIES: [category1, category2, category3
    ]
I think this item can go into category1 and that can go into category3

#OUTPUT format
[
        {
    "command": "addCard",
    "title": "this item",
    "owner": "category1"
        },
        {
    "command": "addCard",
    "title": "that",
    "owner": "category3"
        }
    ]
conversationType: What type of conversation is this? Reply with one of the following: "calendar", "matrix", "undetermined"
checkCalendarDates: Are there any calendar dates appearing in the conversation? Reply with either "true" or "false".
createJSONDates:
From the #INPUT conversation, output dates and activities occuring on that day in JSON format following the example #OUTPUT format.

#INPUT example:
We are going to China on the 14th of December and then Vietnam on the 27th of December.
#OUTPUT example:
{"14": ["China"], "27": ["Vietnam"]}
listOthers:
List any activities mentioned in the #INPUT conversation in JSON list format.
#INPUT example:
Let's totally do some skiing and buy some souvenirs while we're there!
#OUTPUT example:
["Skiing", "Buy some souvenirs"]
checkMatrixType: The conversation so far is listed in #CONTEXT
